channel.title: String index out of range 19:
channel.description:
Hello, on my server every time i try to click the log out button , my cmd spams "String index out of range 19" Im currently using deltascape
and no i can't think of wat i done last to of made this happen
Heres my error in cmd box [code]java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 19 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:850) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savegame(client.java:17959) at client.logout(client.java:10086) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:318) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15529) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16889) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:268) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Error with player 1, Hgfhgfsgfkjj java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 19 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:850) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savegame(client.java:17959) at client.logout(client.java:10086) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:368) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:281) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19 [/code] Anyone no the problem??

item.title: String index out of range 19:
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

at client.savegame(client.java:17959)

Your using the paradise source I see. Just remove those 3 lines or so.

Hello, on my server every time i try to click the log out button , my cmd spams “String index out of range 19”
